title: Didn't Get LP for a win
body: I just won a ranked game and after the game ended. The client just automatically closed. The honor screen didn't even show up. I checked my profile and I'm still at the same amount of LP. Is it delayed or am I just not going to get any ;o

replies.body: Do you have [close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled?  This will cause the client to close while in a match, but take a bit longer to reload after.  Which game was this for?  Ranked or Flex, and what champion were you playing?  I'm happy to take a look!
Can you look into my recent game? My friend and I were at 0 LP and won. He was stuck in the game and no one received/lost LP. FlD (NA) + onetwoduy (NA)

I don't have that option enabled. Also it was on my alternate account: Bhocolate Milk
It was for Ranked. I played Zed
*Edit. It's showing that it was a normal game. I guess somehow I mistook draft for ranked.
